ability.Frost Armor: At the start of battle, the Pokemon creates a layer of ice armor, reducing damage from physical moves by 25%. If hit by a physical move, the armor breaks and deals damage to the attacker of 1/8 of its max HP.
ability.Frozen Surge: When this Pokemon uses Flash Freeze Breath, it creates a freezing cloud on itself. The next Ice-type move used by Frostana will deal double damage and consume the cloud.

Flash Freeze Breath.effect: Has a 30% chance to freeze the target.

Icy Wall.effect: Creates a wall of ice that reduces damage from the next three attacks by 50%.

Tail Lance.effect: Clears the user's all stat changes.
